#summary Explains how to install the community plugins.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

=Installation=
To install any of these plugins, download the relevant binary (DownloadInstructions) and then...

  # Shut down all instances of Visual Studio.
  # Place the downloaded plugin(s) into your DXCore plugin folder. This is typically something like: `C:\Program Files\Developer Express Inc\DXCore for Visual Studio .NET\2.0\Bin\Plugins`
  # Start Visual Studio. The plugin(s) are now installed.

=Usage=
Each plugin has its own usage instructions. See the [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/w/list wiki] for more on each individual plugin.

=Known Issues=
For answers to some questions and some workarounds/info on known issues, check out the KnownIssues page.
